Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to price gouging of medicine
Summary: Prohibits selling a drug subject to a shortage for an unconscionably excessive price.
LawCode: Add ยง396-rrr, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the price gouging of medicine
